summary: Providing for the improvement of the sidewalk area surrounding Block 60, Addition, as laid out by A.A. Denny (commonly known as A.A. Denny's 5th Addition), by constructing decorative sidewalks, etc.; in accord with Resolution 27219 of the City Council of the City of Seattle; creating Local Improvement District No. \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_and providing for payment of the cost and expense of the improvement by special assessments upon property within the district by payment by bonds.
